Comments.UseMockServices: Set to true for development/testing with mock data. Set to false for production with real services.
Comments.UseApiGateway: Set to true for production to use API Gateway. Set to false to call services directly.
Comments.BaseUrl: The base URL of your backend API. Only used when UseMockServices is false.
Comments.ApiGatewayUrl: The API Gateway URL for production. Only used when UseApiGateway is true.
